title: Announcement, Artemisia: Chicago Artists Spaces Collaborate, 1987
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, upper left quadrant, running upward, sideways: Design: Edward Fella [symbols]
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper third of sheet, center: Iris Adler/ Mi Sook Ahn Chung/ Marlene Bauer/ Susan Bloch/ Carol Block/ Barbara Cooper/ Margaret Lass- Gardiner/ Lorri Gunn/ Cindy Hoyne; across center: ARTEMISIA/ ARTEMISIA/ galler/ CHI CAGO/ ARTISTS/ SPACESCOLLABORATE:/ 1987 OCTOBER 16-NOVEMBER 15, 1987; across lower third of sheet: Alice Joyce/ Margaret Lanterman/ Joan Livingstone/ Christine O'Conner/ Melissa Pinney/ Nancy Plotkin/ Fern Shaffer/ Fan Warren/ Maureen Warren; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m. Opening: Friday/ October 16. 6-8pm/ While in the area please attend the Michigan 150/ opening at the Detroit Artists Market, 5-7:30pm; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025
Verso: Imprinted in black across center, enclosed by irregular shapes: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ ARTISTS SPACES/ COLLABERATE:/ ARTEMISIA/ CHICAGO/ GALLER/ OCTOBER 16 -/ NOVEMEBER 15, 1987; across lower left quadrant: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ Across from the PeopleMover Station/ 743 Beaubien/ Detroit,/ Michigan/ 48226; across lower edge: With the support of/ the National Endowment of the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts/ Detroit Council of the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Non-Profit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ P A I D/ Detroit, MI/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles, throughout.  
Recto:  Across center, text composed of various patterns, giving exhibition title, dates, surrounded by images of pattern.  Across center from upper edge to lower edge, interrupted by title text, text giving participating artists, each name followed by symbols.  Lower left edge, text giving location and contact information.    
Verso: Across center, text giving exhibition title, dates enclosed as patterned shapes within a close-fitting line.  Across lower half of sheet, text giving sponsors, mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Artemisia: Chicago Artists Spaces Collaborate, 1987. Offset lithograph on off-white paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-29
